snippet.title: FLOOP'S BIG HOUSE ADVENTURE DEMO TRAILER!
snippet.description:
Buttery Games presents Floop's Big House Adventure! 

A reimagining on our fave games from the 90's, help Floop defend his house from waves of monsters. Defeat disgusting bosses, collect rad guns and upgrades, and uncover the secret of the Attic!

Looking for testers, sign up on our website or on discord:
https://www.discord.gg/KWwbHD2
https://www.butterygames.com

Follow us for more: 
https://www.twitter.com/butterygames
https://www.instagram.com/butterygames/
https://www.facebook.com/ButteryGamesDev
